name: Ascii Burrd
description:
This is one of them there Flappy clones. This is an Android only game (compatible with versions 2.2 & up). The .apk can be downloaded from this page.

Uploaded here temporarily until Google Play developer console stops being rubbish. I know, the game is c**p.

TIP : At the start of a game, if you tap on the text saying "go" lots of times, ads are temporarily disabled for a number of playthroughs.
